SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT031
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
The response to this request is a message containing the number of messages sent and received for all General Purpose Application or FIN sessions started and closed within the specified time period, and closed at the time of the request.It is possible to request a global session history report for all logical terminals belonging to a SWIFT address. The response to this message is contained in the MT 051 Session History Report.
From: User To: GPA or FIN
================= =========== Notes
The two occurrences of field 177 specify a date-time range where the first field 177 is the start time and the second is the end time. The first field 177 must be a date not older than 30 days. If the start date is older than 30 days, the report received is empty. The second field 177 must not be more than seven days after the first field 177.
The 30 day period is a rolling window of exactly 30 x 24 hours back from the moment of the request, eg, if the request is sent at 11:05 local time, the report will provide information as from 11:05 local time 30 x 24 hours ago.

SystemField.Name: lt-code
SystemField.description: 9th character of BIC-12. The value X signifies details of all LTs belonging to the destination.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: lt-code
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: 9th character of BIC-12. The value X signifies details of all LTs belonging to the destination.

SystemField.Name: start-date-time
SystemField.description: Start date and time. Must not be more than 30 days before the date of this message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: date-time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFT Network is in GMT.

SystemField.Name: end-date-time
SystemField.description: End date and time. Must not be more than 7 days after the start date and time.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: date-time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFT Network is in GMT.

fieldvalidation.name: E1
fieldvalidation.comment: The field 'start-date-time' must be a date not older than 30 days and the field 'end-date-time' must not be more than seven days after the date in the field 'start-date-time'.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The field 'start-date-time' must be a date not older than 30 days and the field 'end-date-time' must not be more than seven days after the date in the field 'start-date-time'."
